scene_description_enriched: A haloed male figure, likely a saint, stands holding a book in his left arm and a staff or crozier in his right hand. He wears a monastic habit. The background features a dotted pattern suggesting a celestial or decorative setting, framed by an arched architectural element. To the left, a stylized landscape with hills and a building is visible, while to the right, a creature, possibly a lion, is depicted. The overall scene is framed within an ornamental border.
